item.title: Trump’s border czar suggests a possible drawdown in Minnesota, but only after ‘cooperation’
item.description: President Donald Trump’s border czar says immigration enforcement could reduce the number of officers in Minnesota.

item.title: New videos show Alex Pretti scuffle with federal officers in Minneapolis 11 days before his death
A shadow network in Minneapolis defies ICE and protects immigrants
